explains: n. （角色的）扮演；（画、书等中的）描绘，描写；绘画，照片

sentences.en: The article examines the portrayal of gay men in the media.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章剖析了传媒对男同性恋者的描述。

sentences.en: He is best known for his chilling portrayal of Hannibal Lecter.
sentences.cn: 他以饰演令人毛骨悚然的汉尼拔•莱克特而著称。

sentences.en: The media persists in its portrayal of us as muggers, dope sellers, and gangsters.
sentences.cn: 媒体坚持将我们刻画成抢劫犯、毒品贩和匪徒。
